divs: Sighting Detailsit was during the 4th of July when the odd vehicle apparently docked with a larger vehicle. Soon I found a pair of bionoculers to observe the bullet-like struture scramjet.after 4 minuets it headed west at unimagenible speeds and faded away.Soon after two jets were headingthe exact same direction.
